## Quarto {.unnumbered}

Quarto is a fantastic way to get started writing reports 
without spending **a ton of time** messing with things like: 

* font sizes
* styles
* spacing

Quarto has excellent documentation at <https://quarto.org>.

```{R}
calc <- 1 + 1
print(calc)
```
